channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Amen
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Amen

item.title: CVE-2024-3992|2024-06-14T06:00:03.910Z -- unknown -- amen
item.description: The Amen WordPress plugin through 3.3.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
